ModLib
Table of Contents

Class WeakList<T>

Namespace
ModLib.Collections
Assembly
ModLib.dll

A list of weakly-referenced values, which are removed when the underlying value is GC'ed.

public class WeakList<T> : WeakCollection<T>, IList<T>, ICollection<T>, IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable where T : class

Type Parameters

T

The type of the elements of this list.

Creates a new collection of weak references to a given type containing elements copied from the provided collection.

Parameters

collection IEnumerable<T>

The collection whose values will be copied.

Parameters

capacity int

The number of elements the collection can initially store.

Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

Parameters

index int

The zero-based index of the element to get or set.

Property Value

T

The element at the specified index.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

index is not a valid index in the IList<T>.

NotSupportedException

The property is set and the IList<T> is read-only.

item T

The object to locate in the IList<T>.

Returns

int

The index of item if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
